extendedInfo.description: American News now supports widget. No notification, icon and bookmark ads.It's a fast and easy way to read U.S. news on Android. American News gives you easy access to read the most popular news sources from U.S on your Android device. Take this app with you and stay informed with access to the latest news.FEATURES* News by site.* News by category.* Download news briefs automatically.* Offline reading.* News widget.* Remove or sort news sources.* Edit default news sources.* Subscribe news sources via RSS.* Import more news sources via OPML.* Option to block images (reduce bandwidth).* Share news via SMS, Email, Facebook, Twitter...

reviews.comment: App integration with twitter is out of sync. App is worth a look if you read the target publications.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app - would pay to remove ads
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sync\'s the app when you don\'t want it running and eats up your data and battery.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What I was looking for
reviews.comment: I was looking for an application with many news sources so I wouldn\'t have to download different apps . It has many news sources and a simple design to access news. Ads are tiny and on the bottom so it\'s okay for me.
reviews.author: Laura Rodriguez

reviews.title: keep it up!
reviews.comment: pls update the ui just like that of indonesia news. thanks anyway, such a useful and practical app.
reviews.author: Nasus K
